00011 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_MEMBER_FUNCTION_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00012 #define BOOST_TT_IS_MEMBER_FUNCTION_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00013 
00014 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00015 #include "boost/detail/workaround.hpp"
00016 
00017 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION) && !BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, < 0x600)
00018 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_mem_fun_pointer_impl.hpp"
00019 #else
00020 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00021 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp"
00022 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_mem_fun_pointer_tester.hpp"
00023 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00024 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/false_result.hpp"
00025 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_or.hpp"
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 // should be the last #include
00029 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace boost {
00032 
00033 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION) && !BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, < 0x600)
00034 
00035 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(
00036       is_member_function_pointer
00037     , T
00038     , ::boost::type_traits::is_mem_fun_pointer_impl<T>::value
00039     )
00040 
00041 #else
00042 
00043 namespace detail {
00044 
00045 #ifndef __BORLANDC__
00046 
00047 template <bool>
00048 struct is_mem_fun_pointer_select
00049     : ::boost::type_traits::false_result
00050 {
00051 };
00052 
00053 template <>
00054 struct is_mem_fun_pointer_select<false>
00055 {
00056     template <typename T> struct result_
00057     {
00058         static T& make_t;
00059         typedef result_<T> self_type;
00060 
00061         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00062             bool, value = (
00063                 1 == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::is_mem_fun_pointer_tester(self_type::make_t))
00064             ));
00065     };
00066 };
00067 
00068 template <typename T>
00069 struct is_member_function_pointer_impl
00070     : is_mem_fun_pointer_select<
00071           ::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00072               ::boost::is_reference<T>::value
00073             , ::boost::is_array<T>::value
00074             >::value
00075         >::template result_<T>
00076 {
00077 };
00078 
00079 #else // Borland C++
00080 
00081 template <typename T>
00082 struct is_member_function_pointer_impl
00083 {
00084    static T& m_t;
00085    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00086               bool, value =
00087                (1 == sizeof(type_traits::is_mem_fun_pointer_tester(m_t))) );
00088 };
00089 
00090 template <typename T>
00091 struct is_member_function_pointer_impl<T&>
00092 {
00093    BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = false);
00094 };
00095 
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_function_pointer,void,false)
00099 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00100 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_function_pointer,void const,false)
00101 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_function_pointer,void volatile,false)
00102 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_function_pointer,void const volatile,false)
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 } // namespace detail
00106 
00107 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_member_function_pointer,T,::boost::detail::is_member_function_pointer_impl<T>::value)
00108 
00109 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00110 
00111 } // namespace boost
00112 
00113 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
